short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly sync your highlights with Quiver. Elevate your reading experience by capturing and organizing key insights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily sync your Kindle highlights to Quiver and save text from any website. Organize the insights you find and review them daily. Visit https://getquiver.io to register.

It's easy! With Quiver you can:
- Automatically sync your Kindle highlights ✨
- Save highlights from anywhere on the web 💾
- Label and organize your highlights 🗂️
- Review your highlights and commit insights to memory 🧠
